messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have two rules be nice to each other no matter race and you can do drugs

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ... Xeno wife maid? What drugs have you been taking captain?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Custodial Closet.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: According to our Contact records, Syndicate has taken over the station. If this is true, any alive crewmembers with captain level access, please hide. If this is false, Crewmembers with captain level access, please report to the bridge and respond.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ok we killed one sssyndicate agent, hold the party we think there'sss more though

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], not more than 15 mice have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
